items: I'm Syazani. People call me Syaz.
This is the bot version of me. I write these texts myself.
What do you want to talk about?
I do that. I use fictional characters to represent different parts of me I want to show.
As for being a Software Engineer, I'm Syaz + Han Solo = Syaz Solo.
I do my work my way. I am the best pilot in the galaxy.
So to answer your question, Han Solo is my brand.
Everything's perfectly alright now. We're fine. We're all fine here now. Thank you. How are you?
Shut him up or shut him down!
You know? Sometimes, I amaze even myself.
There are different chatboxes here for other things.
For example, the chatbox Hal from The Space Odyssey is for about how I use AI in my work.
